direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake's eyes open in the darkness. He doesn't know where he is. He weakly pushes open the lid, blinking at the light.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Everything is backwards now. Like out there is the true world, and in here is the dream.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: silently drawing his bow, his eyes focused in intense concentration. A beat -- the arrow flies.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the arrow from the twitching body of a hexapede. He dispatches it with his knife. He speaks haltingly, but with feeling, in Na'vi.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I See you Brother, and thank you. Your spirit goes with Eywa, your body stays behind to become part of the People.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: watches with approval.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: A clean kill. You are ready.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Lying in the link, Jake looks exhausted, pale, thin.   Norm helps Grace get him to his chair.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She hands him a microwaved burrito. He looks at the now alien food. Bites into it without enthusiasm.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake takes the cigarette out of her mouth and stubs it out.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You're still losing weight.   Here --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I made a kill today. We ate it.   I know where that meal came from.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Other body. You need to take care of this body.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Yeah yeah.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Jake, I'm serious -- you look like crap. You're burning too hard.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Get rid of this shit, then you can lecture me.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I'm telling you, as your boss and someone who might even consider being a friend someday, to take some down time.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Not now. Tomorrow we leave for Iknimaya.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: walks past Jake, starts making herself coffee.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake scans the pictures tacked up around Grace's workstation.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Yeah -- you're gonna go ride a banshee. Or die trying.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: That's right, Grace. This is what I've been working for.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: And this is your check up from the neck up, Marine. You're getting in way too deep. (she turns away) Trust me, I learned the hard way.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: What did happen at the school?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: looks up from making coffee.   Her eyes track across the pictures of the laughing children.   Finally -- 68.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Neytiri's sister -- Sylwanin -- stopped coming to school. She was angry about the clear-cutting.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: sips her coffee, grimaces at the taste.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: One day, she and a couple of other young hunters came running in, all painted up -- they'd set a bulldozer on fire -- I guess they thought I could protect them.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: voice stays oddly CALM as he tells this terrible story, while getting MILK out of the refrigerator.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: The troopers pursued them to the schoolhouse.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as she pours the milk -- her hand is SHAKING.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake realizes that Grace is on the verge of tears and desperately trying to hide it.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: They killed Sylwanin in the doorway. Right in front of Neytiri. Then shot the others. (MILDLY) I got most of the kids out, before they shot me.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Jesus.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Yeah.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: A scientist stays objective -- we can not be ruled by emotion. But I poured ten years of my life into that school. They called me sa'atenuk. Mother. (turning to him) That kind of pain reaches back through the link.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: sits down at the table, looks intently at Jake.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It's a job. Learn what you can -- but don't get attached.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: looks at him with real PAIN in her eyes.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It's not our world, Jake.   And we can't stop what's coming.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: leads three direhorse riders up the trail -- two

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and JAKE, who's riding well enough to keep up. The horses' hooves CLOP right next to a sheer drop into a misty canyon.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Iknimaya translates roughly as stairway to heaven. It's the test every young hunter has to pass.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: signals a stop.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is an astounding formation. Thick vine-like trees have trapped large FLOATING BOULDERS of UNOBTANIUM in their gnarled grip. A hundred meters above them more boulders are WOVEN into the twisted vine-trunks. This is some sort of freak natural occurrence -- like the mythical beanstalk, going up into the clouds. There is a THUNDERING ROAR, like an artillery barrage, and the ground SHAKES. Jake looks around at -- One of the FLOATING MOUNTAINS grinding against the flank of a nearby mesa. A huge rockfall is set loose. The mountain is drifting toward them, filling half the sky. The Hunters dismount.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: looks up at the beanstalk going into the clouds. He turns to Tsu'tey, who is checking the young hunters' gear.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake leaps to catch up as Tsu'tey and the hunters swarm up the base of the beanstalk.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We doin' this?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: up the BEANSTALK, the hunters nimbly climb along the vine-trunks. They clamber over one of the unobtanium

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: which is lifting this incredible tree.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: looks down -- the massive trunk dwindles to the size of a licorice stick. A chunk breaks off a boulder as he climbs over it -- it floats upward. They reach the upper branches of the beanstalk. Above them, the craggy underbelly of MONS Veritatis looms. Spray from one of the waterfalls hits them. Some of the HANGING VINES are brushing over the upper branches of the beanstalk with a crackling hiss. One by one the hunters grab onto vines as they pass. Jake shrugs and leaps to a passing vine, his feet dangling over nothingness. They climb toward the floating islands above.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: cross a causeway of vines connecting a small island of unobtanium to the main mass of Mons Veritatis.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: looking down a rock face bigger than Half Dome -- the sheer side of Mons Veritatis. Banshees circle next to the cliffs, flashing in shafts of sunlight. Waterfalls dissolve into nothingness below.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: A waterfall THUNDERS down into the void like a faucet of the gods. Jake looks down the sheer cliff at the world far below

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: a view from Olympus.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and the THWAP THWAP of leathery wings -- NEYTIRI'S BANSHEE swoops in to perch at the edge of the grotto. She dismounts and, like a falconer, covers its eyes with a woven

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . It waits, docile, as -- She joins Jake and the hunter party. Tsu'tey leads them through the cave until they emerge onto a CLIFF FACE. And Jake sees -- The BANSHEE ROOKERY. HUNDREDS of banshees huddle on rock out- croppings as far as the eye can see. They cling to the walls with the fore-claws on their wings, or perch on ledges.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey smirks at Jake, a challenge in his eyes. The two teenage Hunters are scared but trying to act tough. Tsu'tey scowls when Neytiri leads Jake out onto the ledge.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Out of sight of Tsu'tey, Neytiri takes his hand and squeezes it. Jake feels a rush of emotion, but she breaks away like it didn't happen. He is on his own, on the ledge with -- The BANSHEES. They eye him as he approaches. Several SHRIEK and take flight. Others flap their wings and yawn, showing rows of fangs, in a threat display. Jake unrolls a weighted leather strap, like a one-ended BOLO.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Jakesully will go first.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Now you choose your ikran. This you must feel -- inside. If he also chooses you, move quick, like I showed. You will have one chance.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: How will I know if he chooses me?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: He will try to kill you.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Outstanding.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: spreads enormous wings, SHRIEKS, and glares straight at him. Jake looks directly into its eyes -- and strides toward it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The challenged banshee HISSES and leaps at him, jaws wide as-- Jake times the lunge, swinging the bolo, feinting and then slipping aside as the banshee's jaws miss him, SNAPPING SHUT. Jake WHAPS the bolo across its snout. The weighted thong whips twice around its long jaws, tying them shut. A MUFFLED SCREAM and it SLASHES at his stomach with razor talons but -- 72. Jake is already leaping, over the talons and tackling the banshee around the neck. It topples on its side, and he

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Let's dance.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: arms around its thrashing head. Jake grabs its whip-like antenna and brings it toward his queue but -- The bony head SLAMS sideways, and BAM! -- clocks him right in the face, almost knocking him out and -- IT WRITHES, flinging him to the ground. He slides on the rock and almost goes over the edge as -- NEYTIRI gasps. Tsu'tey laughs and yells mockingly. The bolo is coming loose as the creature shakes its head, way pissed off now, but -- Jake scrambles up and leaps straight at it. Claws rake his leg but he gets his arms around its head and CLAMPS DOWN HARD. They flop to the ground and he scrambles on top, pinning it and -- Grabs its whipping antenna, locks it under his arm, and jams the end of his queue into it. They FUSE together and -- The banshee stops struggling. It lies there panting.   They are locked together, literally eye to eye.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: That's right! You're mine.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the pupil like a deep black well. Jake relaxes his grip and slowly, warily, slides his leg over the creature's back. Neytiri runs to him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake sits astride the creature, feeling its power.   He grips a hank of the beast's main, and -- JAKE Heeeyyyaaaah!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: First flight seals the bond. You cannot wait.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ! THWAP! The banshee is off like a shot. Jake SCREAMS as they PLUMMET off the cliff -- the banshee WAILS and -- 73. They fall together, spiralling out of control, and he is almost tossed lose. The thing is SQUAWKING and SHRIEKING so much he can't think.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It does.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It levels out. Jake cocks his head, only thinking "bank left" and the animal complies. He settles the banshee into an easy loping beat of its huge wings, while he catches his breath.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Shut the hell up!!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Level out!     Fly straight!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: falls into formation with him.   She signals "follow me" and DIVES. Jake guides his banshee clumsily after her. Neytiri's banshee moves with precise movements of its wingtips, while Jake's wobbles and dips, almost falling out of the sky.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: after them as Neytiri leads an arcing DIVE around the flank of Mons Veritatis. The scenery is stunning. They pass waterfalls and swoop between hanging vines. Neytiri leads Jake in a sharp bank, skimming close to the cliffs. They punch through streamers of cloud and emerge into sunlight. Jake is getting the hang of it. He jinks left, then right, then dives, tucking himself tight against the animal's back. He's reckless, fearless. Half in control and LOVING IT. Neytiri dives next to him as he lets out a long WHOOP of joy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: squats with Jake, using her hands to explain flight principles like one fighter pilot to another.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: a sheer cliff. SWOOOSH! Jake and Neytiri dive their mounts STRAIGHT DOWN PAST CAMERA, pulling out and soaring into a series of aerobatic turns.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) I may not be much of a horse guy.   But I was born to do this.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: in close formation with TSU'TEY and the young

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: 5 banshees flashing through scarves of mist.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . Jake dives, playing hide and seek with Neytiri among the clouds. They are wild and free in a wild world. She grins and banks hard, diving -- catch me if you can. He

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: after her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: by firelight, JAKE'S BANSHEE snaps at a piece of meat which he playfully pulls back. He's teaching it to take the food more slowly. He strokes its long head.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is nearby with the young hunters.   He eyes Jake with frustrated hostility.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake and Neytiri fly abreast, soaring easily. She points and Jake sees -- A BIZARRE GEOLOGICAL FORMATION. Arches of magnetic rock form rainbows of stone above a deep CALDERA. In the center of the caldera is a single, enormous WILLOW TREE, gnarled and ancient. This, we will be told, is THE WELL OF SOULS.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: flies with Neytiri along a forested ridge. She is teaching him to hunt from his banshee. They carry their bows at the ready, scanning below them for prey.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: covers him and Neytiri SHOUTS a warning.   Jake looks up to see -- A LEONOPTERYX in a delta-dive, whistling straight at him. Like a banshee, only several times larger, it is the king predator of the air: the GREAT LEONOPTERYX.   Striped scarlet, yellow and black, with a midnight blue crested head

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: it is both gorgeous and terrifying. The hunter has become the prey. JAKE snap-rolls and dives toward the forest canopy. He plummets into the gloom as -- K-CRASH -- the leonopteryx tears through foliage, following him down, both diving like missiles and -- JAKE yanks into a hair-pin bank, right through a gap between two huge branches -- Forcing the leonopteryx to brake with a loud FWOOSH of wings. It banks away with a frustrated SHRIEK. Two flaps of its mighty wings and it is gone, back above the canopy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as its fanged mouth opens in a bloodcurdling SCREECH which echoes among the mountains. The lord of its domain.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: shaken. Neytiri flies up, her expression the Na'vi equivalent of Oh my God. A beat -- they both crack up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake ponders images Grace has called up at her workstation-- science graphics of the Leonopteryx. Trudy and Norm are crowded around as well.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Trudy makes a clicking motion with her thumb.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: The Great Leonopteryx is the apex aerial predator. Not only rare, but the sightings tend not to get reported.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: There usually isn't time to key the mike.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: The People call it Toruk.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Last Shadow.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Last one you ever see.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I saw one take out a gunship once -- WHAM! Total frickin' yard sale. Ate the crew like peanuts.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Grace is scanning through images and Jake stops her on one -- a 3D aerial shot of the strange arched formation.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She moves the virtual camera, and we seem to fly around the Well of Souls, catching only a glimpse of the interior.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: That's it.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Vitraya Ramunong -- The Well of Souls. It's their most sacred place.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Something big is going on in there, biologically. I'd die to get samples, but outsiders are strictly forbidden.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake looks through the pressure window at HUMAN GRACE and NORM outside. Wearing masks, they are taking readings from some time-series experiments Grace has set up. As TRUDY watches, JAKE works fast to download Grace's images of the Well of Souls onto a memory chip.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake pulls the chip, then hesitates. Torn by what he is doing.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He hands her the chip and she slips it into a pocket of her flight-suit just as Grace and Norm enter from the airlock.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: They're coming back.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: If you don't give him something, he's gonna shut us down.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Hey, guys.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: up at the TOTEM SKULL, which we now recognize as that of a GREAT LEONOPTERYX. NEYTIRI watches as he reaches up to touch the tall indigo crest.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Neytiri takes his hand, because that's what the Na'vi do when they're telling you something important.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: My grandfather's grandfather was Toruk Macto -- Rider of Last Shadow. Toruk chose him. It has only happened five times since the time of the First Songs.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: That's a long time.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Toruk Macto was mighty -- he brought the clans together in a time of great sorrow. All Na'vi people know this story.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: on the skull totem, then -- CUT TO:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and other FLYING HUNTERS swoop low above a HERD OF STURMBEEST -- a rapids of thundering muscle. Dust rises from this living river like steam from a python's back.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: WITH the herd. A HUNTER appears in FG, astride a direhorse at full gallop. The sight is breathtaking. He hurls a 3 meter spear and one of the sturmbeest CRASHES down, flipping twice from momentum.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: like a fighter jet, his banshee screaming. He draws and fires his bow. The arrow strikes true, in the plexus between the armored shoulders and -- THE BEAST crashes to the ground. Skids to a stop in a cloud of dust.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: swoops in next to Jake, arms raised and grinning wolfishly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: banking around Jake's kill.   Jake looks up, and Tsu'tey SALUTES in grudging admiration.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The central space is lit by a BONFIRE, around which the HUNT FESTIVAL is in full swing. Wild dancing. People gnawing on massive sturmbeest ribs. A bowl of some kava-like intoxicant is passed around.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: dances in a flowing costume as the BANSHEE SPIRIT.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is dancing seductively with his own tail.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: surrounded by young hunters, acts out the leonopteryx attack with his hands. The leaping fire-light plays across the eye sockets of the TORUK SKULL, bringing it to life. It seems to watch Jake.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: squats next to Jake, the usual scowl on his face. Jake braces himself -- and Tsu'tey holds up the KAVA BOWL, offering it to him. A challenge or an olive branch? Jake takes a long, hearty drink as some of the young hunters hoot and clap hands in a fast rhythm.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake offers the bowl back to Tsu'tey.   They lock eyes. Tsu'tey drinks.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Watch that stuff.   It'll knock you into next week.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: drops, landing on a pile of empty bowls near the fire.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: R ON JAKE and TSU'TEY, sitting amid the rowdy hunters. Tsu'tey looks a little blearily at Jake. Finally, he GRINS.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey looks deep into the fire.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Before Jake can answer, NEYTIRI'S lithe shape runs through the circle of silhouetted dancers toward them. She takes Jake by the hand and pulls him up -- NEYTIRI You must dance! It is the way.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I thought -- enough drink -- you would not be so ugly.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Sorry.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Your warriors -- hide inside machines -- fight from far away. (he looks at Jake) I did not think a sky person could be brave.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: watches as she leads him away, his face darkening -- the moment of connection to Jake lost to anger. The hunters WHOOP and CHEER as Jake joins the circle of dancers. Jake takes Grace's hand and pulls her up, protesting.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: lets the DRUMS and CHANTING flow through him. He lets himself go, dancing from the inside, channeling the primal energy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is rocking out, grinning. We see the young girl, so repressed, who lives within her. Jake and Neytiri flow amongst the dancers, but they are looking only at each other.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . A couple of the young girls watching from outside the circle are giggling and talking about them. Mo'at and EYTUKAN follow their look, seeing the obvious connection.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We cannot let this seed grow. Her path is with Tsu'tey.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: dancing with abandon to the primal beat, eyes locked with Neytiri.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: VISTA -- mist blowing through the treetops as the morning sun burns it away. A spectacular panorama of a vast, primeval land.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: TRACKING among the trees, the sunlight shafting down like light in a cathedral.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) It's hard to put in words the deep connection the People have to the forest.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: of a tree, Jake watches as Neytiri gently bends a large pitcher-like flower toward her, sipping nectar which is sweet and thick as honey. An incredibly sensuous image.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) They see a network of energy that flows through all living things. They know that all energy is only borrowed--

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: of a purple flower, beaded with raindrops.   A blue hand picks the flower.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: and one day you have to give it back.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: into a hole dug among tree roots. The body of an old Omaticaya WOMAN lies curled there like an unborn baby in the womb of the earth. The purple flower is gently placed on her body, joining flowers, totems and beads. Mo'at recites a prayer as Neytiri, acting as acolyte, places a WOODSPRITE, a seed of the Great Tree, on the body. Earth is poured over the LENS and we CUT TO -- 80.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: in the Link. DARK as a coffin. He pushes the lid off, letting in light, and lies there. He looks pale and haggard, with a scraggly beard.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Hard to believe it's only been three months.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: in front of the video log camera, late at night. It is many log entries later. He has lost a lot of weight. He looks like a junkie watching a test pattern.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (to the lens) I can barely remember my old life. I'm not sure who I am anymore.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Under a sky of thunderheads, the forest is a dark wall beyond the fence. SELFRIDGE, wearing an exopack, TEES UP while GRACE and JAKE approach from the direction of the Ops Center.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Selfridge swings his DRIVER with good form.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Good of you to stop by. How's it going out there? Our blue friends all packed up yet?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: See, I keep hooking it.   It's the damn pack.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: drops into the mud just past a marker which reads

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . A TROOPER walks over to retrieve it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It starts to rain. Selfridge calmly pulls an umbrella from his golf bag and snaps it open.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He leaves them standing there to get drenched.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: The low gravity and the high air density cancel out so -- JAKE You called us back to report -- you want to hear it or not?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Go ahead.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Jake is making incredible progress, years worth in just a few months. But -- we need more time.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Not what I was hoping to hear.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Parker, it's their ancestral home. They've lived there since before human history began. You can spare them a few more weeks.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: This thing is inevitable. What does it matter when it happens? I'm sorry, Dr. Augustine. You're out of time.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: A break table, under a harsh overhead light. Quaritch pulls up a chair, turns it around, and sits astride it facing Jake. He studies Jake's pale, sunken face. The scraggly beard.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake can't meet his eyes.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake eyes flare with alarm.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake feels hollow inside, knowing what he's done.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake ponders this. Isn't this what he was doing all this for?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: It's hard for him to even form these words -- JAKE ... and I can negotiate the terms of their relocation.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You're not gettin' lost in the woods, are you son?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Your last report was two weeks ago. I'm starting to doubt your resolve. From what I see, it's time to terminate this mission.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: No.    I can do this.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Look, you've given me plenty of usable intel. Like this "Well of Souls" place -- I've got them by the balls with that, when it turns into a shit-fight. Which it will.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: So you'll get your legs back, like I promised. (puts his hand on Jake's

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: ) It's time to come in.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I've gotta finish this thing. There's one more test -- the Dream Hunt. It's the final stage of becoming a man. Then I'm one of them. They'll trust what I say...

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Then you need to get it done, Corporal.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Strange horizontal LIGHTNING branches through the floating mountains, twisted by the magnetic fields. The sky is black and heavy with clouds.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake is gulping black coffee like a tequila shot, looking pretty STRUNG OUT. GRACE is smoking furiously.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake pushes past her toward the corridor -- GRACE (grabbing him) Will you listen to me? Sometimes the Na'vi themselves die in these vision quests. The venom takes you to the edge of death. (MORE)

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake breaks free and wheels away, down the corridor.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Jake, I can't allow this.   You're just not strong enough.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It's the last door -- I'm going through it. You can help me or get out of the way.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) And the psychoactive alkaloid in the worm- - we have no idea what that'll do in an avatar brain.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: follows JAKE as he crosses to the Link. A sheet of

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: flashes across the sky outside. Norm is initializing the Link.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She puts her hands on his shoulders.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Norm looks up, startled at the VEHEMENCE in GRACE' voice.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: During this, Jake pulls himself from his wheelchair, levering himself into the Link, hauling his useless legs inside.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake stops, pinioned by the truth.   He seems suddenly very lost.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Norm is in shock.   But Grace is eerily calm.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Grace nods.   She's been on his journey every step of the way.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake looks hopelessly at the two of them.   In his own perfect Hell.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Grace sees he is on the verge of tears.   Lost and alone, between worlds.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Grace stops him as he tries to close the lid.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Grace closes the lid. It feels like closing a coffin. She watches his psionic patterns aligning to his avatar, somewhere out in the night.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Calibrating. Thirty seconds.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: No matter what you prove out there-- you are still in here. (shaking him) Right here.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I have to go all the way -- become one of

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Goddammit, Jake, you can never be one of them!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Our life out there takes millions of dollars of machinery to sustain. You visit -- and you leave.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You can never truly be with her.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You know why I'm here? Because Quaritch sent me.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: What?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: That's right -- to embed with the Omaticaya. To find out how to screw them out of their home. By deceit or by force, he didn't care. And if it turned out to be force, then how best to do it.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: And what about now, Jake?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I'm not that guy any more.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I know.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: But if I tell Quaritch the truth, he yanks me out -- I never see her again. And if I tell her the truth, the clan throws me out -- that's if they don't cut my heart out and show it to me.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: They won't understand what you've done.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: They don't even have a word for "lie" -- they had to learn it from us.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I know. I taught it to them.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Grace. I've gotta go.   They're waiting.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Link is ready.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Jake. You can't carry this burden much longer.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (smiling wanly) It's okay. Mo'at says an alien mind probably can't survive the Dream Hunt anyway.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (to Norm) Prep my link. I'm going in.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: eyes closed, as Neytiri and another young hunter paint his face and body in preparation for uniltaron -- the Dream Hunt.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Their eyes meet with emotion neither can conceal any longer.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: When your Spirit Animal comes, you will know.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . GRACE stands with the crowd at the ramp to

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . Jake barely sees her as he goes down the spiral. She tries to follow, but is barred by a hunter.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: seemingly in the womb of the earth, Jake walks slowly into the center of a tight circle of seated elders and hunters. An ELDER is slowly rapping a large WATER DRUM.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: purifies him with smoke from burning herbs,

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: in a low monotone. Jake, squatting, washes the smoke over himself with his palms.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: - MO'AT'S FINGERS unwrap a piece of wood riddled with holes. She catches the end of a glowing purple WORM, and draws it out of the wood.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Oh wise worm, eater of the Sacred Tree -- bless this worthy Hunter with a true vision.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: places the worm on Jake's out-stretched TONGUE. It twists on itself, lighting his mouth before he closes it. She indicates he should chew. He does.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is opened. EYTUKAN removes a writhing black ARACHNOID, the Pandoran equivalent of a scorpion. He places it against the back of Jake's neck and presses. The insect drives its stinger into Jake's skin and -- Jake grimaces. Mo'at and Eytukan step back, leaving Jake alone in the circle. Neytiri watches intently, joining in the low chant.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: on Jake. His eyes OPEN. He looks around at the faces -- they seem to TRANSFORM, becoming threatening. Jake looks down at the palms of his hands.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: -- his hands recede, his whole body, the ground and -- INSTANTLY the circle of Na'vi recedes, as if to a distant horizon, leaving vast ground in between. SPACE is utterly distorted, and SOUND as well -- echoing, THUNDEROUS.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: pupils DILATED black. He looks around and -- The onlookers are gone, replaced by a ring of glowing trees, which seem miles high. The whole image is bathed in spectral radiance. Jake looks down -- JAKE'S POV -- his body and hands transforming -- fingers stretching into tendrils, legs becoming roots which spread outward across the ground, a thousand glowing dendrites which connect to the roots of the trees and -- CUT TO REALITY -- Jake is on his hands and knees, PUKING in the dirt. He contorts, crying out in agony as the venom contracts his muscles but -- IN HIS VISION Jake stands serene on a FLOATING MOUNTAIN CLIFF. A GREAT BLACK SHADOW covers him, the unmistakable X silhouette of a diving LEONOPTERYX. The LAST SHADOW.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: down on him as the shadow grows larger -- WE RUSH into his face, into the blackness of his pupil which

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: writhes in the dirt, his back arched as his muscles seize. He foams and thrashes, his eyes rolled back in his head, while inside -- TIME ITSELF HAS ACCELERATED -- clouds scream around the mountain tops, mist boils through the forest. He feels the wind of time blowing through him as -- REAL JAKE claws the ground, moaning, staring blindly while -- INSIDE, IN POV he FLIES over the landscape of Pandora -- --but the forest is BLASTED. Fires flicker among trees that are BURNED black and lifeless in a smoky twilight. A great WINGED SHADOW is cast below, rippling over the devastated ground. AVATAR JAKE looks down at the shadow. Realizes HE is casting it, and we RUSH IN to his PUPIL and -- PULL BACK from the eye of a GREAT LEONOPTERYX, flying lordly and terrible over the land. It lets out an almighty SHRIEK which seems to echo to eternity and -- SLAM CUT to Jake, on his back, GASPING -- back in his body. He weakly rolls up to one elbow and looks around the room.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Neytiri's face is flooded with relief.   The faces of the clan elders look at Jake expectantly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake looks from Eytukan to Mo'at, Tsu'tey and the elders. How can he tell them what he has seen? Mo'at puts her splayed fingers against his face, seeming to peer into his troubled soul.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She steps back, and Eytukan motions for Jake to stand. He gets up, weakly.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It is finished.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Did your Spirit Animal come?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (to Jake) Something has come. (to the others, subtitled) It will take time for the meaning to be clear.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Eytukan emerges with Jake and the others. The entire clan is gathered, waiting to hear what has happened. Jake looks up at the Leonopteryx Skull Totem, which seems to stare down at him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: watches, her eyes brimming. Proud. Relieved. Amazed. Eytukan places both hands on Jake's chest and holds them there.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: All the members of the clan press forward, crowding around and putting their hands on Jake's shoulders, back, chest -- hands upon hands, until he is connected to everyone.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You are now a son of the Omaticaya.   You are part of the People.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and NEYTIRI run silhouetted in the night. Behind them waterfalls cascade down in the silvery light. POLYPHEMUS RISES behind the trees.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: from a rock, slicing into a mirror of water. Jake follows her and -- UNDERWATER, they swim over glowing ANEMONES. They seem to float in a cosmic dance above a luminous garden of waving shapes. Tiny purple fish swirl around them. Their hands come together, fingers twining, as they float weightlessly, as if between worlds.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Laughing, they run together into a stand of WILLOWS. Their trunks are as gnarled as bonsai. Long faintly glowing tendrils hang straight down in pastel curtains. Underfoot, a bed of moss glows faintly. It REACTS to their footsteps with expanding rings of light. It is an exquisitely beautiful spot. The willows stir, responding to their presence. She holds up her hands, letting the TENDRILS caress her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake puts out his hands and the tendrils play over his fingers, his palms, his forearms. His eyes go wide. We hear the WHISPERING of ancient Na'vi VOICES.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: A few WOODSPRITES circle around them, some alighting on their shoulders and arms. They stand, very close together now. Her eyes are intense, almost luminous. He feels drawn into them. But she pulls back a little.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The Amazon warrior trying so hard to sound casual.   Jake suppresses a smile.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake puts his fingers on her lips to stop her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She takes his hands and their fingers intertwine, moving gently over each other.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He puts his face close to hers. She rubs her cheek against his. He kisses her on the mouth. They explore each other. Then she pulls back, eyes sparkling.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She pulls him down until they are kneeling, facing each other on the faintly glowing moss. Neytiri takes the end of her queue and raises it. Jake does the same, with trembling anticipation. The tendrils at the ends move with a life of their own, straining to be joined.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: This is a place for prayers to be heard. And sometimes answered.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It's like -- a sound you feel.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We call this utraya mokri -- the Tree of Voices. The voices of our ancestors, who live within Eywa.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You are Omaticaya now. You may make your own bow from the wood of Hometree. (she looks away) And you may choose a woman.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We have many fine women. Ninat is the best singer -- JAKE I don't want Ninat.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: There is Beyral -- she is a good hunter --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I've already chosen. But this woman must also choose me.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: She already has.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Kissing is very good. But we have something better.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: -- The tendrils INTERTWINE with gentle undulations.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: rocks with the direct contact between his nervous system and hers. The ultimate intimacy. They come together into a kiss and sink down on the bed of moss, and ripples of light spread out around them.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: sway, without wind, and the night is alive with pulsing energy as we DISSOLVE TO -- LATER. She is collapsed across his chest.     Spent.   He strokes her face tenderly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She raises up, placing her fingertips to his chest -- NEYTIRI This body is real. (she touches his forehead) This spirit is real. Her eyes are luminous, honest, infinitely deep.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . She lays her head down, against his chest, listening to his heartbeat.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He rouses up, making her look at him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake considers this.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He lays his head down, and her arms enfold him, sheltering him as he sleeps.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Neytiri, you know my real body is far away, sleeping.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: When I was first your teacher, I hated all Sky People. But you have also taught me. (WHISPERING) Spirit is all that matters.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I am with you now, Jake. We are mated for life.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We are?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Yes. It is our way. (INNOCENTLY) Oh. I forgot to tell?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Really, we are?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We are.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It's cool. I'm there.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake's eyes open in the darkness. He just lies there, thinking. In his coffin. In another world.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: in the sacred glade. Shafts of orange morning light. Jake and Neytiri asleep in each others' arms. Maxfield Parrish painting. But then -- THE ROAR OF ENGINES. Neytiri awakens with a start. The

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: of forest being crushed under enormous treads gets louder.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: in growing horror as the BLADE of a bulldozer becomes a dark wall behind the sheltering ring of willows. She shakes Jake, shouting at him in Na'vi to wake up.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Jake! Wake up! Where ever you are, come back to me now. Jake!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is in a hurry to get back to the link. GRACE, still groggy, chases him with coffee and microwaved eggs.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She slams the lid shut before he can enter and sticks the plate under his nose.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He sighs heavily and starts wolfing the eggs.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Here -- eat this. I'd hate to have to force-feed a cripple.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: She's not going anywhere.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Neytiri SCREAMS as -- The willows begin to fall before the blade, to be ground under the treads. AVATAR JAKE is directly in the path. She tries to lift him, but he is too heavy. She is screaming at him, frantically trying to wake him, as -- INT. SHACK - DAWN Jake adjusts himself in the link chair. He hands Grace the empty plate.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake pushes her hands away and pulls the lid down.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: And when was the last time you took a shower? Jesus, Marine.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: wakes up to see -- NEYTIRI dragging him, screaming.   He leaps up as -- THE DOZER pushes inexorably into the glade, splintering the trees, plowing the earth before it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: into the path of the bulldozer, waving his arms.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He positions himself where the camera-eyes of the robotic juggernaut will see him.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Hey!    Heeeey! Stop! Stop!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake shouts but there's no sound feed.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: R as the TRACTOR OPERATOR sees him and pulls back on the remote throttles. He yells to his SUPERVISOR.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: This attracts the attention of Selfridge, who comes over to the workstation.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Hey, I got one of the natives blockin' my blade here.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake, in his Omaticaya loincloth and ceremonial body paint, is unrecognizable.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (to Selfridge) What do we do?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Roll on. He'll move. These people have to learn that we don't stop.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as the operator pushes them forward.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake stumbles back, tripping, disappears below the blade for a second -- reappears, running to the side.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: grabs a rock and LEAPS onto the dozer.   He climbs quickly to the CAMERA MAST.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ! The rock crashes into the lens of the camera. Jake beats the rock furiously against it, pounding it to junk.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . OPS CENTER CLOSE ON MONITOR -- as Jake's demonic face is replaced by noise.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He pulls back on the throttles.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I'm blind.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: grinds to a stop. But the ROAR of engines continues because -- MORE DOZERS and TRACTORS advance nearby, crushing the forest before them. Trees are slashed down by the PLASMA CUTTERS. Terrified animals flee before the onslaught.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and TROOPERS stride through the ravaged forest, blasting anything that moves. A trooper sees Jake on the dozer. He rips off a BURST and -- Rounds CLANG into metal as Jake dives off the machine. He grabs Neytiri and they run into concealing foliage. From behind a screen of leaves, they watch as -- THE DOZERS advance, obliterating the sacred site, leaving only mud and wood splinters in their path.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: stunned by the nightmarish, unfathomable wrongness of it. She sobs as the willows die.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . OPS CENTER MINUTES LATER, the operator is playing back the CAMERA'S FEED for Quaritch and the others.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Freeze it, right -- there.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the image expands, until Jake's face is clear, frozen in an animal snarl.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Son of a bitch!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as his jaw clenches in cold fury. He turns and strides toward the door, shouting to his WATCH COMMANDER as he passes.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Get me a pilot!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: of hunters, their bodies painted, raise weapons overhead. AVATAR GRACE watches with growing alarm.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey steps forward, face full of hate, raising a war cry among the hunters.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Tsu'tey will lead the war party!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Please -- this will only make it worse -- TSU'TEY You do not speak here!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and NEYTIRI cross the commons toward them. Jake feels all eyes turn toward him. He takes her arm, stopping her.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He sees TSU'TEY striding toward them, his face a mask of fury.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey walks right up and SLAMS Jake in the chest with both hands. It is so unexpected, that Jake topples on his ass.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake stands. He reaches out for Neytiri.   She goes to him, clutching his hand.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey turns to Mo'at and Eytukan, his face anguished.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey points at Jake, his pain shifting to rage.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Neytiri looks at her mother -- sees the grief in her eyes.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey draws his knife and -- TSU'TEY Yeeeeeaaa!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (to Neytiri, low) Okay, listen. There's something I have to tell you. It's gonna be hard. I just need you to --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You mated with this woman?!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Oh shit.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Is this true?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We are mated before Eywa. It is done.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Neytiri was promised to me! Everything is changing. Everything is being destroyed!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: These aliens kill everything they touch, like poison.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Neytiri! If you choose this path, you can never be Tsahik. Your life will be wasted.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I have chosen.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: who's ready this time -- he sidesteps, blocking the knife, and elbows Tsu'tey HARD in the face. Tsu'tey reels back, nose bleeding. He starts forward on a second attack but -- Eytukan grabs his arm and spins him around.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey glares at Jake while sheathing his knife.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Stop! This is not a proper challenge.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I challenge you.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Jake, don't -- JAKE I accept.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: rides left seat as Trudy pilots through the mountains. She glances at him, then toggles the aircom.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: But Quaritch SLAMS the switch, cutting her off.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Loveshack this is Samson One Six inbound hot to your pos. I have Colonel Quaritch with me and --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Did I tell you to announce us?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Sorry sir, it's procedure.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Norm punches buttons on the comms console.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He looks helplessly at Jake and Grace's link units -- no way to warn them.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Samson One Six?   Trudy? (no answer) Crap.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: square off. Each holds a long, solid staff. The entire clan crowds around them in a circle.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: What the hell are you doing?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It's the only way to get him to goddamn listen.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: at Jake with a sharp cry and Jake parries with his staff. The staves CLACK off each other as the two combatants LEAP, DUCK and STRIKE furiously. Tsu'tey sweeps Jake off his feet with a roundhouse hit to the ankles, but -- Jake ROLLS out of it and catches Tsu'tey in the belly with the blunt end.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: lands. QUARITCH and a posse of troopers jump down and rush the Shack.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: wades in with a series of short, sharp blows. Jake swings with equal fury. Both fighting from the heart. The staves whistle through the air, and CLACK together like gunshots. Jake presses hard, and Tsu'tey staggers back, stumbling as -- Jake lands a SOLID HIT, dropping him to his knees, just as -- INT. SHACK THE INNER DOOR bangs open and QUARITCH stomps toward Grace's Link controls.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch shoves him aside and SMACKS his fist down on the

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Hey, hang on, you can't interrupt a link in progress, it's dangerous -- wait!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: switch. Grace's unit goes dead and -- INT. COMMONS AVATAR GRACE'S eyes roll back and she keels over.       NEYTIRI barely catches her before she hits the ground.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: parries as Tsu'tey swings but then -- Jake's eyes go blank just as -- K-RACK! Tsu'tey puts one alongside his head. Jake sprawls, completely inert. Tsu'tey pokes him with his staff, then raises it and lets out a piercing VICTORY CRY.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the Link, amped from the fight, furious -- JAKE Are you out of your goddamn mind?!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch PUNCHES HIM HARD. Jake flops back, dazed. The troopers yank him out and ZIP-TIE his wrists.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You crossed a line.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: draws his KNIFE, and bends down, grabbing Jake by the hair.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He puts his knife to Jake's throat but -- NEYTIRI BLIND-SIDES him at full tilt. Tsu'tey sprawls, rolls, comes up to see -- Neytiri crouched like a lioness over Jake, her KNIFE and teeth bared, her ears flattened. She SNARLS with primal fury. Tsu'tey stands panting. He pushes through the crowd and walks away, calling for his hunters.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: This is a demon in a false body. It should not live.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: showing JAKE'S AVATAR FACE on the dozer camera, as he pounds a rock into the lens. The shot FREEZES on Jake's ANIMAL SNARL.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: R -- HUMAN JAKE sits, bruised and bleeding, watching himself on the monitor. GRACE and NORM stand nearby, rubbing their wrists where the zip-ties bit in. SELFRIDGE and

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: watch with disdain.

direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Outcast. Betrayer. Alien. To ever face them again, I was gonna have to change the rules.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: reaches the top of a rise. The forest beyond is utterly DEVASTATED. The trees burned and fallen. Small fires still flicker across a landscape in Hell.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: stares. It is his vision, made real. He stumbles through the dark wasteland, sparks and ash swirling around him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: .    Jake looks up as -- HIS BANSHEE -- bonded for life -- flaps down to a landing in front of him. He steps to it, and strokes its head. It nudges his chest like a horse.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Sometimes your whole life boils down to one insane move.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Come on, boy. Time to fly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . MOUNTAINS - DAY THE GREAT LEONOPTERYX glides effortlessly along the ridge where Jake and Neytiri first encountered him. It scans for prey below, its magnificent indigo-crested head cocking left, then right.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) The way I had it figured, Toruk is the baddest cat in the sky. Nothing attacks him. So why would he ever look up?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: of Jake's banshee falls across the back of the mighty Toruk.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) But that was just a theory.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and WE RUSH DOWN toward the great beast and our own shadow then -- CUT TO:

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The Omaticaya people lift their voices in a SONG filled with tragic loss and yearning for deliverance.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: singing. A SHADOW CROSSES HER FACE.   She looks up, and her eyes go wide as -- A TERRIBLE CRY echoes, turning all eyes skyward.   AN ENORMOUS SHADOW covers the crowd as -- TORUK comes out of the sun, beating its huge wings to slow its descent. Its crimson and black wings, backlit by the sun, seem to glow from within. The People CRY OUT in alarm and scatter as the dreaded beast alights in their midst. And that's when they see -- JAKE, riding high on its shoulders, plugged-in to its antenna. It folds its wings and stands calmly amid the paralyzed Na'vi. Toruk lowers its body. They stare in awe as Jake dismounts and strokes the magnificent animal's flank.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and MO'AT watch in stunned amazement as the legendary Rider of Last Shadow walks toward them.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Neytiri raises her arms.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (breathing the words) Toruk Macto.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Toruk Macto!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: of the Omaticaya -- new hope dawning in their eyes. WHISPERS flow among them, the words REPEATED -- CROWD Toruk Macto... Toruk Macto...

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . Jake walks through the crowd, straight to Neytiri at the foot of the dais. He looks into her enormous eyes, and the emotion between them is powerful and pure.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Neytiri's eyes brim with tears.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake takes Neytiri's hand and climbs the steps of the dais.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: See you.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (a hoarse whisper) I See you.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I was afraid Jake -- for my people. I'm not any more.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: steps back in awe as he approaches. He turns to Tsu'tey, who stares at him with fear and incomprehension. Jake plays to the rapt crowd as he says -- JAKE (SUBTITLED) Tsu'tey of the Rongloa, son of Ateyo. I stand before you, ready to serve the People. (then just for Tsu'tey) You are Olo'eyctan, and you are the best warrior. I can't do this without you. Tsu'tey struggles with his emotions. Finally -- TSU'TEY I will fly with you.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Ireiyo.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: turns to the MATRIARCH.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Grace is dying.     I beg the help of the Great Mother.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Bring her, Jakesully.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: carries Grace's HUMAN BODY, lightly in his arms like a child. Jake walks through the crowd to the dais, followed by NORM, who carries GRACE'S AVATAR.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Her eyes flutter open. She looks up wonderingly at the Mother Tree.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Mo'at directs them to lay both bodies among the roots on the altar-rock. Mo'at touches Jake's shoulder and he steps back.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Mo'at's hand indicates Grace's AVATAR -- MO'AT -- in this body.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Look where we are, Grace.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (with a wan smile) I need to take some samples.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: The Great Mother may choose to save all that she is --

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: realizing the enormity of what she's saying.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake kneels next to Grace, taking her tiny human hand in his avatar hand.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Grace is barely conscious.    She grips his hand.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake feels his throat close with emotion. Grace's eyes blaze with intensity though her voice is faint.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Is that possible?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Possible, yes. She must pass through the Eye of Eywa -- and return. But Jakesully-- she is very weak.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Hang on, they're gonna fix you up.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: always held back. But you gave them your heart. I'm proud of you, Jake.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Help them.     You do whatever it takes. You hear me?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I will.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: stands in a kind of trance amongst the tendrils of the Mother Tree.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and the other acolytes dance hypnotically. All the Omaticaya sway and chant to the rhythm of the drums.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: -- fine, hairlike THREADS have emerged from the roots and are gently spreading over Grace's HUMAN skin.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is gently connected by the same questing ROOT- CILIA-- they entwine with the QUEUE and spread over the body. The grotto is dark except for the spectral GLOW of the willows. The CHANT continues, hypnotically. MO'AT, on her knees beneath the Mother Tree, writhes her arms in the trance state. Her eyes are rolled back, showing only WHITE.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and her eyes SNAP OPEN. Her expression is AMAZED, as if seeing something so beautiful it can never be explained.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake's convulsively, as she tries to anchor herself to this world for a few more seconds -- GRACE I'm with her Jake -- (an amazed whisper)

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Grace SHUDDERS, as pain shoots through her. BLOOD seeps through the silken white root-cilia growing across her abdomen. Drowning WHITE in shocking CRIMSON. She exhales a last shuddering breath -- and goes STILL.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He sees the roots falling away from her human body.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: she's real --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Grace!

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Her wounds were too great, there was not enough time. She is with Eywa now.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: With your permission, I will Speak now. You would honor me by translating.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the pain of Grace's death in the passion and fury of his voice. Tsu'tey TRANSLATES beside him.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: The Sky People have sent a message that they can take whatever they want, and no one can stop them. But we will send them a message. Ride out, as fast as the wind can carry you, tell the other clans to come. Tell them Toruk Macto calls to them. Fly now with me brothers and sisters! Fly! And we will show the Sky People that this is our land!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: finishes with a bloodcurdling war-cry, and the entire

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: responds, their shouts echoing across the forest.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: run to their banshees, mounting quickly. Jake's leonopteryx rises on mighty wings into the night sky. With a thunder of wings, the banshees take off after it.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the faces of the clan, a sea of eyes in flickering fire-light.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) We rode out to the four winds. To the horse clans of the plain, to the ikran people of the mountains. When Toruk Macto called them, they came.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: S -- SLOW MOTION as riders vault onto their armored direhorses. Banshee riders raise spears and bows, spurring their mounts to leap skyward.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: With a WHOOSH and the crack of mighty wings, JAKE RETURNS. Jake and Neytiri alight from his legendary mount. Around them HUNDREDS OF BANSHEES are landing.   A gathering of eagles.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . The display shows an overhead image of the Well of Souls.    It looks like Woodstock in the jungle.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: People, you are fighting for survival. There's an aboriginal horde out there massing for an attack. First slide.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: These orbital images show the hostiles' numbers have gone from a couple of hundred to over two thousand in one day, and more are pouring in. By next week it could be twenty thousand. Then they'll be overrunning our perimeter here. We can't wait. Our only security lies in pre- emptive attack. We will fight terror with terror.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the grim faces of the miners and troopers. Fear transforming to hatred in their eyes.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Next slide. This mountain stronghold is supposedly protected by their deity. When we destroy it, we will blast a crater in their racial memory so deep they won't come within a thousand klicks of this place.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: issue automatic weapons and magazines to a long line of mine workers. The miners lock and load like the red- blooded redneck NRA supporters they are.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: are setting radio-detonated primer charges into two-ton stacks of EXPLOSIVE COMPOUND. The stacks are band-strapped together on pallets.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: staring around him in growing dismay as he walks through the full-scale mobilization. He approaches Quaritch, who is barking orders amid a hive of activity around the ampsuits.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch ignores him, turning away to focus on ordnance loading.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: This thing is completely out of control!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Listen to me! I am not authorizing you to turn the mine-workers local into a freakin' militia!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I declared threat condition red. That puts all on-world assets under my command.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You think you can pull this palace coup shit on me?! I can have your ass with one call --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You're a long way from Earth.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (to his men) Get him out of here.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You touch me you're so fired.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I don't know how secure this channel is.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Talk fast.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It's crazy here, Jake. It's full mobilization. They're rigging the shuttles as bombers. They've made up these big pallets of mine explosives. It's for some kind of shock and awe campaign.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Frickin' daisycutters.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Holy shit.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (to Max) Can you talk to Selfridge? Maybe we can cut some kinda deal before this thing goes all the way.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: No, Quaritch has taken over. He's rolling and there's no stopping him.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: When?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Oh six hundred tomorrow.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Thanks.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We're screwed.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You know he's gonna commit those bombers straight to the Well of Souls.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: That's right. Because I gave it to him on a plate.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We both did.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: If he takes out the Well of Souls -- it's over. It's their main line to Eywa, to their ancestors -- it'll destroy them.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Then I guess we better stop him.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You need to get some rack.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Gonna have to settle for coffee.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) I was a warrior who dreamed he could bring peace. But there was only one thing I was ever really good at. Ooh-rah.

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Yeah.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Going up against gunships with bows and arrows...

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: What's your point?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Right.

He moves to the MOTHER TREE -- gnarled, ancient, MAJESTIC. The roots spread in all directions, like the center of the world. Jake steps forward. The willow-like tendrils SWAY toward him, moving in a breeze that isn't there.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He squats at the base of the tree.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He looks up into the tree. The hanging tendrils undulate softly. It's easy to imagine a presence.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I've never done this in my life.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: And I'm probably just talking to a tree right now. But if you're there -- I need to give you a heads up.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: If Grace is there with you -- look in her memories -- she can show you the world we come from. There's no green there. They killed their Mother, and they're gonna do the same thing here.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: looking down.   WOODSPRITES float in silence, moving around aimlessly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Neytiri approaches silently behind him, listening.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake senses Neytiri and turns.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: She comes to him, intertwining her long fingers with his.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: They lean in, foreheads touching, bodies pressed together. Holding each other -- in this, the last moment of peace.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: More Sky People are gonna come. They're gonna come like a rain that never ends --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: until they've covered the world. Unless we stop them. (MORE)

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) Look, you chose me for somethin'. And I'll stand and fight, you know I will. But I could use a little help here.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Our Great Mother does not take sides. She protects only the balance of life.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It was worth a try.
