direction.raw_text: tearing off one rotor -- then plummets into the trees. There is a satisfying FIREBALL.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: fall out of formation to pursue individual banshee riders, FIRING cannons and rockets.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as the cliff face next to him explodes with cannon rounds. SCREAMING down on him is another Scorpion.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: tucks and dives along the cliff, feeling the rounds splitting the air around him and -- The Scorpions bank after the furiously jinking banshees as they head for cover among the floating mountains, or dive down into the trees.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: in a SAMSON are shooting down banshees like Messerschmidts from a B-17 as -- WE FOLLOW TSU'TEY'S BANSHEE in a full delta dive. He swoops in from its blind spot and -- THE GUNNERS SWIVEL too late as Tsu'tey flashes past them,

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: with deadly accuracy.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: gunship dives after a banshee. It fires an air-to- air missile and the banshee vanishes in an EXPLOSION.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as thirty ships and hundreds of banshees wheel and dive, like the Battle of Britain. Banshees are hit by guns and missiles, falling out of the sky. The occasional trail of smoke and fire marks the demise of a tilt-rotor.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the Dragon is pouring out hellacious fire -- tracer rounds from multiple turrets and missiles from the stub-wing pods.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: hard as TRACERS flash past her.   A Scorpion is right on her ass as -- SHE ROLLS inverted and dives under the edge of Mons Veritatis, then rolls out, zig-zagging through the dangling vines but -- 134.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: stays on her. It rips through the vines, and tracers FLASH toward us as -- SHE JINKS the banshee around a thundering waterfall but -- HER PURSUER explodes right through the curtain of water. It launches an air-to-air missile. NEYTIRI jinks hard, diving. The missile hits a rock outcropping, pummeling her with the shock wave.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: follows her through a narrow slit between Mons Veritatis and a smaller floating island. They run this slot rolled up on their sides and -- THE SCORPION GUNNER locks up Neytiri for a missile shot but -- A SHADOW crosses his canopy. Out of the sun comes a crimson demon, shrieking over the roar of the turbines, and -- K-WHAMMM!! The leonopteryx SLAMS the gunship, driving it downward in a dive. The leonopteryx lashes at it with claws and teeth as they fall together out of control. Jake kicks the gunship loose and it falls like a brick, breaking its back on a rocky promontory and EXPLODING.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as a SECOND SAMSON falls in beside it. This one has its pilot door off, and the PILOT is wearing a breathing mask. The door gunners wave at -- TRUDY, her expression grim behind her mask. She holds the cyclic stick between her knees while she RAKES the other ship with BURSTS from an AR in her lap. The pilot slumps over and the craft tumbles out of control.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: You're not the only ones with guns, you pricks.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: her banshee hard, an enemy Samson right behind her. The pilot is a hotdog, following her down into the trees, under the canopy. They slalom among the trunks at high speed. The gunners hang half out the doors, firing. Bark and leaves explode around Neytiri as she zig-zags through the jungle.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: dives under a huge tree limb, and the pilot follows. He looks up at the last second, catching a glimpse of blue-skinned figures.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: drop a net of woven vines behind Neytiri and -- 135. The SAMSON hits it hard. The net fouls the ship, FLIPPING IT backwards. It crashes upside down to the forest floor.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is hit by GROUND-FIRE. It folds up like a broken kite, crashing down through branches and -- SHE SLAMS into the ground, stunned.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch looks ahead, seeing the WELL OF SOULS. He taps the pilot and points -- QUARITCH There it is. (into his headset) Valkyrie One, this is Dragon. Target is in sight.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: of Valkyrie One, the troopers ready their deadly loads.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Target in sight.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey falls in beside Jake, who talks to him by AIRCOM HEADSET.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We have to stop the shuttles, no matter what it takes.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: nods. He signals, gathering other hunters, who fall in with him as he dives. Jake rolls in after them but -- A GUNSHIP drops in behind him and he is forced to evade as -- TSU'TEY LEADS the attack on the first shuttle. Hunters jink and weave through WITHERING FIRE from the escort ships.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: with jerry-rigged gun mounts ride the broad backs of the shuttles, picking off banshees who get past the escort.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is RAKED by a burst from the dorsal gunners. His mount crumples, plummeting with a dying scream and -- WE SPIRAL DOWN with him, the forest rushing up and -- A BLINDING BLIZZARD of green as he tears downward, catching at leaves and vines. He SLAMS to the ground, badly injured.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ampsuits and troopers advance across the forest floor, firing their cannons and flamethrowers. The GAU-90s rip the forest to shreds.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . Norm, firing as he retreats, is HIT. He collapses, his avatar body mortally wounded as -- HYDRAULIC FEET approach, passing the bodies of direhorses and Na'vi hunters. Norm painfully tries to load another magazine, panting in fear and pain as -- AN AMPSUIT stomps up.    Aims its cannon point blank. B-BLAM!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The top of Norm's LINK bangs open. He reels out, collapsing onto the floor, clutching himself as if he can still feel the pain of death. He sits, huddled, shivering -- crazed.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: lies gasping, mortally injured. He looks up, grimacing, as an ampsuit looms over him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: reaches down and grabs Tsu'tey by his queue, lifting him painfully.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I hear this is worse than death for you, chief.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: cuts Tsu'tey's queue off near the base. TSU'TEY SCREAMS in agony, his nervous system exploding on overload. Grinning, Lyle holds up the queue -- Tsu'tey's only connection to the world-consciousness which is his life.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: bleeding, bruised -- staggers amid burning wreckage. AMPSUIT footsteps approach and she crouches behind a tree. Troopers are seconds from seeing her as -- NEYTIRI knocks an arrow to HER FATHER'S BOW, and readies herself for a last kamikaze shot when -- THE TROOPER on the far right of the firing line sees something on his screens.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The troopers become aware of the GROUND SHAKING. A slow building thunderous ROAR and -- AN AMPSUIT comes FLYING out of the trees, cartwheeling past them, and the SHAKING BUILDS -- 137.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Right flank -- something's coming!   It's all lit up out there.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Mo'at opens her eyes in sudden realization as -- EXT. FOREST The troopers pivot to face -- A WALL OF CHARGING HAMMERHEADS CRASHING out of the foliage in a shower of broken branches as -- THE TROOPERS open fire but -- the stampede drives over them like a wave. Tree-trunk feet shatter the ampsuit cockpits. Troopers are crushed or asphyxiated.

result.heading: -- A WALL OF CHARGING HAMMERHEADS CRASHING

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the foot-soldiers see LIVING SHADOWS flow out of the gloom as -- VIPERWOLVES race among them with flashing jaws. The troopers

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: wildly as they go down, hitting each other as much as their attackers. The survivors break and run as more viperwolves bound out of the shadows.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: watching as HUNDREDS of rider-less WILD BANSHEES converge on Quaritch's ships. They literally darken the sky.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The wild banshees wheel among the ships, ripping into them.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: What the hell -- ?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: slowly getting it.   EYWA is in the fight.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: fires from the door of a Samson. There is a CRASH and the head of a BANSHEE lunges in the open door, jerking him out. Other banshees tear at the pilot's windshield.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: watches in awe as the ground troops scatter in disarray. The viperwolves flash past her, ignoring her. She senses something and turns slowly to see -- A THANATOR emerging from the smoke behind her. A glistening black demon. She stands paralyzed before its stygian gaze--

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and the thanator lowers itself, until its head is just above the ground. It holds that position -- waiting.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . Trembling, she approaches the waiting demon.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: A smoky hell. Fires burn all around. The troopers are disorganized, falling back. Shooting at shadows. Panicked yelling fills the comm freq.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and another AMPSUIT are charging together through the smoky gloom.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: A and C squads -- rally at my pos.   I want -- (screaming on the comm) Who's screaming God damn it?!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We gotta get outta here! Whoever's in charge, call for extraction!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Shutup you crybabies!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: slams into the other `suit, tackling it OUT OF FRAME. Wainfleet whirls to see his squad-mate missing. He moves through a screen of foliage to reveal -- The AMPSUIT -- ripped open. Driver gone. Blood inside the cockpit. He WHIRLS at a sound in time to see -- A THANATOR LEAPING straight at him -- WAINFLEET raises his cannon but--

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: !! It's on him, slamming him to the ground. The cannon goes flying. He's face to face with its nightmare jaws, right outside his canopy-- On its back is NEYTIRI, and it's a toss up which one looks more pissed off. The thanator rears back, muscles rippling as it poises to strike and -- K-KRAAACKK! Slams its teeth right through his canopy. Wainfleet's SCREAM is brief. Neytiri's demon mount rears up and its triumphant ROAR echoes through the forest.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Max runs down the hall, leading the other scientists.   He's yelling into an AIRCOM HANDSET -- 139.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Rogue One, Rogue One, this is Max.   Tell Jake we are in motion. (to the scientists) Get in there. Barricade the door!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The door is hurled open and the SCIENTISTS charge in. Science geeks barricade the door as AVATAR-DRIVERS scramble into their link units, pulling the clamshells down.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Max checks the door is secure from his side then runs down a connecting corridor.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: emerges from the airlock, wearing breathing gear and carrying an AR. He stumbles, dazed, toward the battle.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . MOUNTAINS/ AERIAL JAKE SIGNALS and a formation of hunters rolls in, diving at the lead shuttle, which is already besieged by winged creatures.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: is the scene of a pitched battle. Na'vi hunters hurl themselves off their mounts in waves, overwhelming the troopers.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: are shot, falling out of the ship, as others fly in. They shoot arrows and spears from the end of the ramp, and troopers fall back deeper into the fuselage. The panicked CREW CHIEF slams a switch and the ramp begins to close, a second before he is cut down by a spear.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: plummets at the shuttle from behind. He swoops down, flairs to reduce speed, rolls off his mount and lands, tumbling on the shuttle's broad back as -- GUNNERS try to swing their guns toward him but he RAKES them with his AR, still running forward and -- JAKE PULLS two grenades from his battle harness, yanking the pins out with his teeth. He hurls them down the intakes of the VTOL turbofans as -- HIS LEONOPTERYX BANKS in a tight arc back toward him and -- 140.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as the grenades EXPLODE, shattering the turbines, which riddle the fuselage with shrapnel and -- JAKE LEAPS INTO SPACE, landing on the back of his mount and reconnecting. They flap away, gaining altitude as fire

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: out of the bottom of the shuttle.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the pilot feels the ship dropping.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The pilot and copilot slam the throttle levers forward and -- The FUSION ENGINES BLAZE, thrusting the shuttle forward.    It still falls, its remaining lift fans screaming, until -- IT'S CLIPPING the tree tops when it gets enough translational lift to fly and -- THE PILOT PULLS back on the stick, lifting the nose.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Mains to a hundred percent!   Get me airspeed!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We're good!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: a surviving Na'vi hunter runs forward and -- THOONK!   ARROWHEADS sprout from the pilots' necks and chests.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: out of control, at full acceleration. It

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: into the underside of MONS Veritatis. It EXPLODES, and hundreds of tons of flaming debris drop back into the forest.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: of the other SHUTTLE, the pilots watch the wreckage falling.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Valkyrie Two is breaking off. And if any of ya'll want to get off this piece of shit planet, you better cover our ass, `cause we're the only way back to orbit.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Roger that.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch watches the shuttle bank away, with most of the remaining gunships following.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch draws his pistol.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: He is over the edge-- no logic in his brain now.   Only death.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Get back here you worthless pukes!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Are we breaking off?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: What do you think?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Techs and troopers crowd around consoles, listening to all the yelling and confusion as they try to plot the disintegrating battle.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (in growing alarm) What the hell is going on out there?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Regular troopers and volunteers FLEE through the jungle, scrambling to board SAMSONS as they touch down.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The pilot listens to comms from Hell's Gate.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch's jaw clenches.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Sir, all ground units are falling back to the LZ.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Stay on target.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Mo'at LOOKS UP as the DRAGON appears over the trees like the shadow of Death. Around her, the Na'vi mothers clutch their children to them. We see AKWEY'S BOY among them.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch sets the target cursor on the MOTHER TREE and what we recognize is the ghostly figure of Mo'at.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Switch missiles. Arm all pods.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Arming.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Let's see what these blue bastards do when I bitch-slap their goddess.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . MOUNTAINS/ AERIAL JAKE'S LEONOPTERYX drops toward the Dragon like a Mig 29.     He pulls out, skimming over the ship. Uncoupling, he rolls backward off his mount and -- JAKE HITS, skidding, on the hull of the Dragon. He rolls to his feet, already running as -- QUARITCH sees the leonopteryx WHOOSH overhead and flap away with no rider. He snap-looks aft to see -- JAKE SPRINTING along the spine of the ship, yanking two grenades from his battle-harness, pulling the pins with his teeth, then -- QUARITCH's hand shoots out and SLAMS the pilot's CYCLIC STICK hard over. THE DRAGON lurches sideways, rolling sharply with a ROAR of protesting rotors and -- JAKE IS FLUNG off his feet. The grenades miss the TURBINE INTAKES. One bounces off the ship. The other lodges against a cowling and -- JAKE SLIDES OFF the ship, falling as -- K-BLAM! The grenade blows a two meter hole in the hull -- WHOOOSHH!   Pandoran air swirls inside.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch leaps out of his seat, heading aft as -- JAKE GRABS the edge of a weapons pod, his feet dangling over open space.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (to the pilot) Put your mask on.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch blows a RESCUE HATCH and leans outside. Jake sees him aim his massive PISTOL.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ! K-WHAM! Rounds clang next to Jake's head. He LETS GO, plummeting into the trees -- Jake plunges through jungle canopy. He catches a HUGE LEAF, as Neytiri taught him -- it bends down, breaking his fall -- 143.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: dropping again only to catch ANOTHER LEAF, and then another, and -- WE RUSH DOWN with him through this green blur.   Jake drops to the ground in a feral crouch. Unhurt.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (into his headset) Quaritch is gonna take out the Well of Souls! He's got a clear shot. Hit him, anybody that can! Do it now!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Trudy Chacon is all business.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: On it.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: hard, pulling g's, coming around on the Dragon. She pours on the coal and the Samson leaps forward, straight at the WARSHIP.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: a stream of tracers at her, tearing through her canopy, ripping chunks off her fuselage.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Norm watches her kamikaze run -- NORM No!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (clipped, pilot-like) Norm, I love you.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: raking through treetops and then, at the last instant, YANKS BACK on the stick and -- THE SAMSON leaps straight up and -- K-KRASH!! SHEARS OFF THE COCKPIT of the Dragon as -- QUARITCH THROWS HIMSELF aft along the aisle and -- TRUDY'S SAMSON disintegrates, the wreckage burning as it tumbles into the jungle.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: grips the bulkhead as he stares out the open front of the fuselage. Wind howls through wreckage where the pilot used to be. The forest rushes up to meet him and -- THE DRAGON CRASHES through splintering trees, IMPACTING in a lake with a WHITE BLAST of water.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Norm takes a few steps and drops to his knees.    Imploded by grief.

result.heading: INT.
location: OPS CENTER/ HELL'S GATE ON THE PLOTTING DISPLAY

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: as Quaritch's TRANSPONDER ICON disappears.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Selfridge is stunned.    Suddenly the ROAR of an ENGINE makes them all look up.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Dragon is down. It's off the board.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: What do you mean, off the board?!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: sits in the cab of an enormous SLASH- CUTTER. Max flips Selfridge the bird and pushes a lever forward -- SELFRIDGE Oh shit. Selfridge DIVES as -- K-RASHHHHH! The SPINNING TEETH of the SLASH-CUTTER tear through the window in a blast of glass and lethal air. Alarms go off. The technicians dive for cover in a blizzard of glass and shredded debris. The slash-cutter head pulls back, and AVATARS SCRAMBLE through the gaping hole into the Ops Center -- The TROOPERS look up to see blue giants aiming weapons down at them. The battle is over in seconds. The avatars are holding the Ops Center. Selfridge lies there gasping, in his emergency mask.   In shock. How could this be happening?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: lies half submerged. Out of the water FG, a shape rises -- a AMPSUIT. Inside -- MILES QUARITCH, his face bloody, his eyes burning. He slogs out of the water, covered with mud, then strides into the forest.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: relentlessly through the jungle.    He sees something through the foliage ahead -- the SHACK.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake is oblivious under the link. Through a window we see Quaritch's AMPSUIT step into the clearing.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: levels his GAU-90 at the shack. His finger goes to the firing button--

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: !! A six-legged BLACK DEMON tackles him. Quaritch pivots as he falls, FIRING the cannon. It misses Neytiri by inches. He grapples with the THANATOR as its razor claws SCREECH over his metal armor.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: twist and struggle. QUARITCH UNLEASHES a long burst from the cannon. Rounds tear into the creature, which

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: but -- NEYTIRI wills it to SMASH the cannon hard against a rock, tearing it loose from the `suit's hand but -- Quaritch SLAMS the thanator back against a tree-trunk, almost crushing Neytiri.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ON one hydraulic hand, as it draws the `suit's KNIFE and -- QUARITCH TWISTS violently, ramming the knife up under the thanator's chest armor. The creature ROARS and Quaritch flips on top of it, stabbing.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . The thanator slumps, pinning Neytiri's legs under its great bulk. She is trapped. Quaritch looks down at Neytiri. She glares back at him, panting, scared but defiant.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch turns, seeing Jake DROPPING from a tree limb. The `suit rises slowly, knife glinting in the morning sun.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) It's all over Quaritch --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Nothing's over while I'm breathing.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Kinda hoped you'd say that.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: forward. JAKE closes fast, snatching up the broken CANNON as -- 146. Quaritch SLASHES DOWN with the knife and Jake parries, blocking it with the cannon. He CLOSES faster than the suit can move and -- K-CRACK! -- SLAMS the end of the cannon into the canopy, crazing it with a web of cracks as QUARITCH SLICES air with the huge knife. Jake ducks, coming up to meet the next slash and -- SMASHES the knife hand with the cannon once -- twice -- again

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: in a furious attack -- knocking the knife flying.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: catches him with the other arm, hurling him away. Jake rolls just before -- THUDDD! -- the massive foot stomps down where he just was. He scrambles up as Quaritch CHARGES and -- JAKE DUCKS another round-house, LEAPING forward to smash the canopy again -- then again -- until it is WHITE with cracks. Quaritch manages to GRAB the cannon barrel but -- INSIDE THE COCKPIT, he sees nothing but the sun on the shattered glass. HE HURLS the cannon blindly, but Jake ducks. The massive cylinder cartwheels toward the shack and -- FROM INSIDE we see it CRASH against pressure window, crazing it but not penetrating. Jake's link sits just inside.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Quaritch yanks a yellow handle and -- P-FOOM! -- the canopy BLOWS OFF, flying through the air. Quaritch can see again. He dons his breathing mask. Bends to pick up his KNIFE.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: struggles furiously, trying to get her legs free from underneath three tons of thanator.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: panting, glowers at Jake.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Then, inexplicably, he TURNS.   Walks away.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: How does it feel to betray your own race?

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: the shack, we see him charge straight toward us and -- CRASH! -- he puts his hydraulic fist right through the window. He is reaching inside for the Link when -- JAKE HITS in a flying tackle with every ounce of force he has, knocking the ampsuit sideways and -- 147.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: around the suit, grabbing Quaritch's shoulder and, yanks him forward HARD, SMASHING his face into the edge of the cockpit but -- QUARITCH flings him off with a sweep of his arm, and Jake slams to the ground.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake is holding his breath as the toxic Pandoran air swirls in. GAS ALARMS SHRIEK.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: shoves with one free leg, desperately trying to pull her other leg out.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: charges, the knife flashing down and -- JAKE just manages to catch it in both hands, but the force of the attack drives him to his knees as -- QUARITCH pushes the knife down inexorably, until Jake is pinned against a rock, the blade now inches from his throat.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake is straining to stay conscious, to stay connected as -- THE KNIFE reaches his throat as -- THWAP! AN ARROW APPEARS in Quaritch's chest.   He looks up.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: a FURY released. A classic archer figure, she NOCKS another arrow. Then draws and releases smoothly.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: ! The machine TOPPLES off Jake and lies still.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: at the two arrows in his chest. He touches the feathers of the ancient weapon, then -- with an ironic laugh -- he dies.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: runs up, another arrow nocked, bow drawn. Seeing Quaritch, she lowers her father's bow.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: sees her, then goes limp, his eyes rolling back, and -- INT. SHACK HUMAN JAKE EXPLODES out of the Link, slamming to the floor where he gags for breath. With his last strength, he claws toward an emergency breathing mask -- across the room. He scrambles toward it, on the edge of unconsciousness.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: through the shattered window, landing in the debris like a cat. She GRABS the mask and flashes to Jake's side -- puts the mask over his face and -- 148.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: drags in breath after breath. He looks up at Neytiri, studying him as she holds him -- seeing his human body for the first time. Jake touches her face, his pale human hand against the blue of her skin. There eyes meet across the glass of the mask -- together, separate. Worldless.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: tends to the mortally wounded TSU'TEY as AVATAR JAKE arrives with Neytiri. Mo'at has bound his wounds, but by her expression, it is clear he cannot be saved. Jake kneels and Tsu'tey opens his eyes.   Through a haze of pain, he recognizes Jake.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey weakly clutches his severed queue.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Tsu'tey's voice is weak, but thick with emotion.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I See you, Jakesully.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: See you, Tsu'tey te Rongloa Ateyitan.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Are the people safe?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: They're safe.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I can never ride again, or bond with my woman -- or hear the voice of Eywa. I can not lead the People. You will lead them, Jakesully.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: No. I'm not officer material.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It is decided. Now do the duty of Olo'eyctan. Set my spirit free.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I'm not killing you.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I am already dead.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: No.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: It is the way. And it is good. I will be remembered --

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I fought with Toruk Macto, we were brothers -- and he was my last shadow.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: clasps with Jake's in a fierce grip. Jake draws his knife.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: -- Jake leans forward, blocking the sun.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: falls across Tsu'tey.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: By his movement, we know that he has ended Tsu'tey's pain. Jake's eyes well with tears as he continues reciting the prayer for the dead, and his Na'vi words carry over as we -- DISSOLVE TO:

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Forgive me, my Brother. Go now to the Mother Spirit.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Na'vi ride direhorses among the abandoned machines of Hell's Gate. Banshees roost on the roofs of the modules, and stingbats flutter about, unimpeded. The SENTRY GUNS are silent, and the GATES are open to the forest.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Max, Norm, and a few of the avatars hold AR's as the personnel of Hell's Gate file up the cargo ramp of the remaining shuttle. The evicted humans are sullen and angry, like POW's.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) A few chose to stay. Fewer were chosen.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and NEYTIRI stand together, watching the departure of the Sky People.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: shuffles up the ramp. His eyes -- the eyes of a lost soul -- meet JAKE'S. He disappears into the ship.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: hangs suspended against the dark side of

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: DORA. The ISV's antimatter engines BLAZE to life and it accelerates out of orbit. What remains IN FRAME is a virgin, primeval world. Spanning the black continents is a vast reticulated lace-work of

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: a ghostly WEB connecting all of Pandora.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The sun's rays shaft down through the layers of canopy.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) The forest will heal, and so will the hearts of the People. New life keeps the energy flowing, like the breath of the world.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: obviously pregnant, is bow-fishing in the shallows. Children jump and squeal with laughter in the river.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) This is my last videolog.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jake sits in a chair, talking straight TO CAMERA. He is thin, pale. He looks around the high tech room.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: The science guys will keep the lights on, here. But I won't miss this place.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: glow softly. The entire Omaticaya clan is gathered, seated in a prayer circle around the Mother Tree.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) I better wrap this up. There's a funeral tonight, and I don't want to be late. It was someone very close to me.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: , moving in across the concentric rings of people, all plugged-in and softly chanting. MOVING toward the center, over the figure of Mo'at, to hover above -- NEYTIRI, kneeling beside two FIGURES on the dais -- 151.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: and his AVATAR lie head to head. Human Jake is wearing an exomask. Both figures are still, hands folded, covered in translucent silken shrouds of ROOT-CILIA.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: S IN as Neytiri removes the mask from Jake's human face. She gently closes his dead eyes with her fingertips. Then bends and kisses him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: on AVATAR JAKE as Neytiri's hand comes into frame, stroking his cheek. TIGHTENING slowly to--

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . Hold a beat, then -- They open.
